pages.text: Eglonaspis is a blind amphiaspid from the Devonian. Its fossils were found in Siberia near the Taymyr Peninsula, which was a hypersaline lagoon during the Devonian. It was a benthic feeder that may have spent most of its time buried in the sediment.
